title: Will Georgian law expand the ban on free food, water for voters waiting in line?
subtitle: The Minister for Foreign Affairs calls "global warming" a form of intimidation of illegal voters.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In March 2021, Georgian legislators were considering a draft law that would supplement existing laws prohibiting the giving of gifts to voters in the ballot to explicitly include language that would make it possible to give food or water to voters standing in the line of crime, regardless of the circumstances.
